Starting this book on Wed. May 29. Using R Notebook for practice.  

Basic regression model, defined as a function plus error ($\varepsilon$):
$$ Y = f(X_1, X_2, .., X_p) + \varepsilon $$
Linear regression function:
$$Y = \beta_0 + \beta_1X_1 + \beta_2X_2 + ... + \beta_pX_p + \varepsilon  $$
